definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: compute (perh. orig. divide up, make small, fine; NH chew; Aram. kss break small (rare), usu. (Aph. etc.) correct, convict; Ar. ks= pulverize; As. kasâsu, perh. cut in two, or up, whence kissatu, fodder)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[אִישׁ לְפִי אָכְלוֹ תָּכׂסּוּ עַל־הַשֶּׂה]] Ex 12:4 (P) each one according to his eating shall ye compute for the lamb.
